svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2021-03-01T15:34:37.519Z" agent="5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/88.0.4324.190 Safari/537.36" etag="tqGi77zYGOdPabQmeH_f" version="14.4.3" type="device"><diagram id="9jNjlu1smj9IqYyX8Wta" name="Page-1"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 88px; height: 1px; padding-top: 345px; margin-left: 96px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 88px; height: 1px; padding-top: 345px; margin-left: 473px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 88px; height: 1px; padding-top: 345px; margin-left: 851px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 432px; height: 1px; padding-top: 0px; margin-left: 5px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 260px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

li.font: The DAS will add a user to the user pool (username:password) when a POST request is made to /register. The POST request must include a JSON object including the username and password to register.
The DAS also allows POST requests to /signin again with a JSON object. POST is used for security. This will return a JSON web token
Finally GET requests can be made to /auth with an attached JSON web token which will authenticate and then return the identity attached to the token

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 406px; height: 1px; padding-top: 450px; margin-left: 468px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 320px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

li.font: Will add a driver of drivername to the roster when a POST request is made to /roster/{drivername}. The request must include a valid JWT (JSON web token) and the rate (p/km) that the driver wishes to charge
A driver will be removed from the roster with a DELETE request. Again a valid JWT must be provided
A PUT request will update the rate the driver is charging on the roster. If the driver is not in the roster will return an error. Again a JWT is required
A GET request to /roster will return the roster as a JSON object. NO JWT is required for this action

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 269px; height: 1px; padding-top: 10px; margin-left: 757px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 260px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

li.font:
A GET request to /journey with a query in the format of ?origin={originLocation}&destination=
{destiantionLocation} will return the cheapest driver for that journey and also the price they will charge.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 425px; margin-left: 221px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font: The DMS will send a JWT to authenticate drivers whenever a request is made. The DAS will return the username attached to the token if valid

switch.text: The DMS will send a JWT to authen...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 295px; margin-left: 571px;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font: The JS will make a GET request to the DMS whenever a journey is being processed. The DMS will return the roster
